author: feedback@businessinsider.com (John Haltiwanger), John Haltiwanger
title: Just 27% of Americans think the US is doing better than other countries at containing the coronavirus
description: Associated Press Only about 27% Americans said they think the US is doing a better job at containing coronavirus than other developed countries, a new Insider poll found. And about 46% of Americans think the US is doing worse than other countries in fighting …
content:
Americans do not appear to be overwhelmingly confident in how their country has handled the coronavirus pandemic compared to the rest of the globe. 
Only 27% of Americans said they think the US is doing a better job at containing coronavirus than other devel… [+3481 chars]
